transform.tRule:
# Armenian. # https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode14.0.0/UnicodeStandard-14.0.pdf#page=348 \u0559 → \u02BB; # ARMENIAN LEFT HALF RING → TURNED COMMA \u055A → \u2019; # ARMENIAN APOSTROPHE → preferred apostrophe
# Sindhi implosives. # Preferred representation changed in Unicode 5.0. # https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode14.0.0/UnicodeStandard-14.0.pdf#page=503 \u0917\u093C\u0952 → \u097B; # GA, NUKTA, ANUDATTA → GGA \u091C\u093C\u0952 → \u097C; # JA, NUKTA, ANUDATTA → JJA \u0921\u093C\u0952 → \u097E; # DDA, NUKTA, ANUDATTA → DDDA \u092C\u093C\u0952 → \u097F; # BA, NUKTA, ANUDATTA → BBA
# Bengali KHANDA TA. # Preferred representation changed in Unicode 4.1. # https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode14.0.0/UnicodeStandard-14.0.pdf#page=512 \u09A4\u09CD\u200D → \u09CE; # TA, VIRAMA, ZWJ → KHANDA TA
# Tamil ligature SHRII. # Preferred representation changed in Unicode 4.1. # https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode14.0.0/UnicodeStandard-14.0.pdf#page=531 \u0BB8\u0BCD\u0BB0\u0BC0 → \u0BB6\u0BCD\u0BB0\u0BC0; # SRII → SHRII
# Malayalam legacy ṉṯ conjunct. # Preferred representation changed in Unicode 5.1. # https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode14.0.0/UnicodeStandard-14.0.pdf#page=550 \u0D28\u0D4D\u0D31 → \u0D7B\u0D4D\u0D31; # NA, VIRAMA, RRA → CHILLU N, VIRAMA, RRA
# Malayalam legacy chillu sequences. # Preferred representation changed in Unicode 5.1. # https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode14.0.0/UnicodeStandard-14.0.pdf#page=551 \u0D23\u0D4D\u200D → \u0D7A; # NNA, VIRAMA, ZWJ → CHILLU NN \u0D28\u0D4D\u200D → \u0D7B; # NA, VIRAMA, ZWJ → CHILLU N \u0D30\u0D4D\u200D → \u0D7C; # RRA, VIRAMA, ZWJ → CHILLU RR \u0D32\u0D4D\u200D → \u0D7D; # LA, VIRAMA, ZWJ → CHILLU L \u0D33\u0D4D\u200D → \u0D7E; # LLA, VIRAMA, ZWJ → CHILLU LL
